name: 8U6
description:
Bugs are having a shortage of pink flowers, can you help them to eat them? 8U6 is a zero-player puzzle game about bugs. How to play: Drag and drop objects on the light-green grass. Press the green Play button to make bugs come out from their holes. Press the red Stop button to restart the level. Press the yellow Step button to call only 1 game turn. You win when all of the pink flowers are eaten. Only 1 bug comes out from a single hole. Bugs can step on each other. Bugs die in bushes. Eating flowers makes bugs die.

Read the "README.txt" for more information. Credits are stored there too.

This game includes level editor and 10+ original levels
